title: Reduce size of XML connection file
author: vardars
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
Serializing connection properties takes too much when there is no inheritance applied. I want to propose an approach that if no inheritance is applied, nothing will be serialized to connection xml. That way we can gain some file size and cpu usage IMHO.
